meaning_str.bing:
n. 膜；影片；胶卷；层
v. (在…上)蒙上薄膜；(使)生薄膜；(使)变朦胧；(把…)摄成影片
网络. 电影；胶片；菲林

(在…上)蒙上薄膜；(使)生薄膜；(使)变朦胧；(把…)摄成影片

电影；胶卷；薄膜；（眼睛、液体表面等的）薄膜；（尤指不透明或难以察觉的）薄层；（微生物的）生物膜
拍摄（电影或视频）；将…改编成电影剧本

sogou-CET6.n: 电影业[出现2次)];胶卷[出现0次)]

sogou-CET4.n/v: 电影; 纪录片; 拍摄[出现5次)];薄膜; 薄层; 覆盖[出现3次)]
sogou-CET4.n: 电影业[出现0次)];胶卷[出现0次)]

sogou-gaokao.n: 电影[出现13次)];胶卷[出现0次)]
sogou-gaokao.v: 拍电影; 拍成电影[出现0次)]

sogou-zhongkao.n/v: 电影; 纪录片; 拍摄[出现133次)]
sogou-zhongkao.n: 电影业[出现2次)];薄膜[出现1次)]

1.en: I consider it a pity for you not to have seen the film last night.
1.cn: 我认为昨晚你没看那部影片真是件遗憾事。

2.en: He did not see the film last night. That is because he had to help his little sister with her homework.
2.cn: 昨天晚上他没有去看电影。那是因为他得帮他的妹妹做作业。

3.en: She said to me that she had seen that film.
3.cn: 她对我说，她看过那部电影。

0.en: It's no Ukrainian film. Yeah. Ooh. Earrings.
0.cn: 它不是乌克兰电影。耳环。

1.en: Did you see the film "Trading Places"? No.
1.cn: 你看过电影《颠倒乾坤》吗？没有。

2.en: Twenty-six, and never have watched a film with subtitles.
2.cn: 都26岁了，还没看过带字幕的电影。

3.en: What? E.T. is my favorite film. E.T. is everyone's favorite film.
3.cn: 什么？《ET外星人》是我最喜欢的电影。《ET外星人》是所有人的最爱。

4.en: If he weren't in the film, it would turn out exactly the same.
4.cn: 换言之，整部电影他的角色可有可无。

5.en: We can still catch that Ukrainian film. No, I said fun.
5.cn: 我们还赶得上看乌克兰电影。不,我说好玩的事。

6.en: This 6,400 acre outdoor film set is now the world's biggest.
6.cn: 这个二十五万平方千米的电影外景地，体量之大冠绝全球。

7.en: The film Interstellar deals with the quest for new worlds and the fate of humanity.
7.cn: 电影《星际穿越》讲述的是对新世界和人类命运的探索。

8.en: Or, a guerilla art exhibit in dumbo? Or, hey, isn't the New York film festival still going on?
8.cn: 或者是一场边缘艺术展？还是？对了，纽约电影节还没结束吧？

9.en: Some guy is auctioning off a miniature time machine prop from the original film, and no one is bidding on it.
9.cn: 有人拍卖了一个原版电影里用过的时间机器道具，但竟然没人竞拍。

10.en: No, not really. It's an independent film, you know? So we don't have a real big budget. I figured I'd just stay in your room.
10.cn: 不算是，这是独立制片的电影，没有大预算，我想我住你房间好了。

11.en: Also, Halliday archived every film, game, book, and television program he ever saw, located on the mezzanine.
11.cn: 同时，哈利迪保存了他看过的每部电影，游戏，书籍和电视节目都存档在夹层楼底。

12.en: Hey. Hi. Hey. So, what do you want to do tonight? There's a Ukrainian film at the Angelica that's supposed to be very powerful. Interested?
12.cn: 嘿。嗨。今晚你要做什么？有出很棒的乌克兰电影，你想看吗？

13.en: Space travel has been a staple of the movies from the very beginning, but the feature film Interstellar has a unique pedigree.
13.cn: 从最开始，太空旅行就成为电影的主题但故事片《星际穿越》有独特的背景。

14.en: What about comic books? Fine. Anime? Of course. TV, film, D-and-D, manga, Greek gods, Roman gods, Norse gods.
14.cn: 漫画里的人呢？当然。动漫？当然了。电视，电影，日本漫画，希腊神话，罗马神话，北欧神话。

15.en: And it struck me that the imagery that you can find was so much more extraordinary than anything you see in a science fiction film.
15.cn: 使我吃惊的是，你能找到的图像比你在科幻电影中看到的任何图像都要非同寻常的多得多。

16.en: My name is DW Preminger, and I have my wonderful daughter to thank for the idea behind my new film about a struggling waitress.
16.cn: 我叫DW·普雷明格，感谢我优秀的女儿在幕后替我的新电影出的点子，讲的是一位努力奋斗的女服务员的故事。

17.en: It's really the first time I've had an objective structure around the film saying that time literally is relative that we all experience time differently depending on where we are in the universe.
17.cn: 这真的是第一次围绕电影网有一个目标结构讲述时间实际上是相对的，我们经历的时间都不一样，取决于我们在宇宙的什么地方。

18.en: And even if someone slipped a chill pill into their collective drink, you would still be legally unable to work for the next two years. That's for any studio, any network. Television or film.
18.cn: 即使有人往他们公共饮用水里放了镇静药，在法律约束下，你未来两年都无法工作。无论是在哪家工作室、电视台、电视剧或是电影。

19.cn: 我们该先拍些什么呢？拍我吧！
